concept.title: Cyber Cat: Neon Memories
concept.tagline: A robot cat's quest through a neon cyberpunk city to recover lost memories

playerAbilities.name: Wall Jump
playerAbilities.description: Jump off walls to reach higher platforms

difficultyCurve.description: Starts with basic platforming, introduces wall-jumping in level 1, dash in level 2

concept.winCondition: Collect all memory chips and reach the central server

designRationale: Combines classic platforming with cyberpunk aesthetics. Wall-jumping and dashing create skill-based gameplay. Memory chips as collectibles tie into narrative and progression.
